scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix "[{name}]" --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run dev:backend" "wait-on http://localhost:3001/health && npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix "[{name}]" --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run start:backend" "wait-on http://localhost:3001/health && npm run start:frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/.next
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
